programme.title: Kiesha's Story
programme.desc: Follow Kiesha, who is a vibrant 24-year-old incomplete quadriplegic focused on regaining her strength and retraining her muscle memory as she empowers herself to access health care services in Alberta.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S08EP02) Murdoch and the constabulary confront more violence on the waterfront in their quest to bring Brackenreid's attackers to justice, while Dr. Ogden and Dr. Grace face their own battle in court.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (Detective William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace)

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:
(S01EP05) With the rise of dating apps, virtual reality and porn, is the Internet a utopia, or a minefield, for people with disabilities looking to explore their sexuality ? Rachele hunts for the truth.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S02EP03) Wes is an aspiring actor with an energy that's larger than life. They've recently come out as non-binary and want a new wardrobe that accurately reflects their gender.
Année : 2022

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S03EP03) Elizabeth acquires her own home, which is a surprise to Jack. Gowen's selfish plot is unearthed by Abigail. Frank realizes he can no longer outrun his past.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary "Rosie" LeVeaux) Kavan Smith (Leland "Lee" Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Chelah Horsdal (Cat Montgomery) Mitchell Kummen (Gabe Montgomery) Gracyn Shinyei (Emily Montgomery) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: Sea School: Marine Science Camp
programme.desc:
AMI's Grant Hardy joins a group of blind and partially-sighted high school students as they travel to the remote village of Bamfield, B.C., to learn about the sea and the world beneath its waves.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S04EP05) Dive in and explore foods from the sea as broadcaster Dwight Drummond joins Christine and Carl in the kitchen.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP09) Follow 30-year old disability educator Vicky Levack as she moves out of the institution where she has been living for the past decade, and into the community.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S04EP05) Chris Judge and the crew have big plans for Cindy and Robbie's small basement office space, including creative storage ideas, work space and hiding the dingy ceiling.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP07) While investigating the death of a politician, rumoured to have been killed by a vengeful ghost, Crabtree's theories of the paranormal conflict with Murdoch's scientific beliefs.
Année : 2008

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP36) We explore the latest technology for people who enjoy grilling and are members of the blind and partially sighted community, including accessible grilling gadgets and tech tools.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) In this instalment of Disrupt, we follow work from a filmmaker and an Indigenous artist, and take a peek at an experimental film and a risqué theatre performance.
Année : 2023

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:

Année : 2014

programme.desc:

programme.desc:
